categories: Category:Knights of the Old Republic news organs

nodes.text: The Adjudicator, or The Adjudicator Holofeed, was a trade publication for bounty hunters during the time of the Mandalorian Wars. It was edited by Krav Noblis.
The Adjudicator is one of a number of "news organs" based on the Taris Holofeed that were included as extras in monthly issues of Knights of the Old Republic starting with issue 13.
